content.en: Nanoparticle dynamics: Scientists are using algorithms to study how the size of nanoparticles affects their movement in tumor cells, predict the characteristics of nanocapsule delivery, and map the diffusion of chemotherapeutic drugs in cancer cells. Algorithms are also being used to analyze the impact of individual processes during particle delivery, optimize nanoparticle designs for cancer treatment, and predict nanoparticle distribution in tumor tissues. These computational techniques are helping researchers improve drug delivery systems and advance the field of nanomedicine.
content.da: Nanopartikeldynamik: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at studere, hvordan størrelsen af nanopartikler påvirker deres bevægelse i tumorceller, forudsige karakteristika ved nano-kapsel levering og kortlægge diffusionen af kemoterapeutiske lægemidler i kræftceller. Algoritmer bruges også til at analysere indvirkningen af individuelle processer under partikellevering, optimere nanopartikeldesigns til kræftbehandling og forudsige nanopartiklers fordeling i tumortvæv. Disse computerteknikker hjælper forskere med at forbedre leveringssystemer for lægemidler og fremme nanomedicinens felt.
